org.apache.reef.runtime.common.evaluator.context

Class ContextManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.runtime.common.evaluator.context.ContextManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public final class ContextManager
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Manages the stack of context in the Evaluator.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Shuts down.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws ContextClientCodeException
        Start the context manager. This initiates the root context.
        Throws:
        ContextClientCodeException - if the root context can't be instantiated.

      • close

        public void close()
        Shuts down. This forecefully kills the Task if there is one and then shuts down all Contexts on the stack, starting at the top.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • contextStackIsEmpty

        public boolean contextStackIsEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if there is no context.

      • handleContextControlProtocol

        public void handleContextControlProtocol(EvaluatorRuntimeProtocol.ContextControlProto controlMessage)
        Processes the given ContextControlProto to launch / close / suspend Tasks and Contexts.

        This also triggers the HeartBeatManager to send a heartbeat with the result of this operation.

        Parameters:
        controlMessage - the message to process

      • getTaskStatus

        public Optional<ReefServiceProtos.TaskStatusProto> getTaskStatus()
        Returns:
        the TaskStatusProto of the currently running task, if there is any

      • getContextStatusCollection

        public Collection<ReefServiceProtos.ContextStatusProto> getContextStatusCollection()
        Returns:
        the status of all context in the stack.
